dimension: overall (4 sides finished): 25 x 24 in. (63.5 x 60.96 cm)
title: Bamako
text: Using a silk screen print process, the Bamako pattern was applied to the warp threads of the cloth before they were woven, a technique that created a reversible fabric. However, during the weaving process, the mill could not maintain the horizontal calibration of the pattern. As a result, the panels did not align when sewn together for drapery. This one-of-a-kind sample never when into production.
description: Warp printed.  Scroll pattern. Vert. Rpt. 14.5\". Red & blue Red Earth/Indigo
